text: Isabelle Fuhrman (born February 25, 1997) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Esther in the 2009 horror movie Orphan and Clove in the 2012 dystopian adventure movie The Hunger Games. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. Category:American child actors
title: Isabelle Fuhrman
